name: angular2-webpack-advance-starter
description: An Angular 2 Webpack Starter kit featuring Angular 2 (Router, Http, Forms, Services, Tests, E2E, Coverage), Karma, Protractor, Jasmine, Istanbul, TypeScript, and Webpack by AngularClass
author: Jo√£o Ribeiro <jonnybgod@gmail.com>

scripts.build:aot:prod: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:aot && npm run ngc -- --webpack config/advance/webpack.web.prod.js && webpack --config config/advance/webpack.web.prod.js  --progress --profile --bail
scripts.build:aot:prod:desktop: npm run clean:aot && ./node_modules/.bin/ngc-w -p tsconfig.desktop.json --webpack config/advance/webpack.desktop.build.renderer.js && webpack --config config/advance/webpack.desktop.build.renderer.js  --progress --profile --bail && npm run build:prod:desktop:main
scripts.build:aot:desktop: npm run clean:dist:desktop && npm run build:aot:prod:desktop && build -mwl --x64
scripts.build:aot:desktop:linux: npm run clean:dist && rimraf desktop/linux/* && npm run build:aot:prod:desktop && build --linux --x64
scripts.build:aot:desktop:mac: npm run clean:dist && rimraf desktop/mac/* && npm run build:aot:prod:desktop && build --macos --x64
scripts.build:aot:desktop:windows: npm run clean:dist && rimraf desktop/win/* && npm run build:aot:prod:desktop && build --win --x64
scripts.build:desktop: npm run clean:dist:desktop && npm run build:prod:desktop && build -mwl --x64
scripts.build:desktop:linux: npm run clean:dist && rimraf desktop/linux/* && npm run build:prod:desktop && build --linux --x64
scripts.build:desktop:mac: npm run clean:dist && rimraf desktop/mac/* && npm run build:prod:desktop && build --macos --x64
scripts.build:desktop:windows: npm run clean:dist && rimraf desktop/win/* && npm run build:prod:desktop && build --win --x64
scripts.build:docker: npm run build:prod && docker build -t angular2-webpack-advance-start:latest .
scripts.build:prod:desktop: npm run build:prod:desktop:renderer && npm run build:prod:desktop:main
scripts.ci:aot: npm run test && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e && npm run build:aot:desktop
scripts.ci:jit: npm run test && npm run build:prod && npm run e2e && npm run build:desktop
scripts.ci:testall: npm run test && npm run build:prod && npm run e2e && npm run build:aot && npm run e2e && npm run build:desktop && npm run build:aot:desktop
scripts.clean: npm cache clean && npm run rimraf -- node_modules doc coverage dist desktop _temp compiled
scripts.git:merge: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/master --allow-unrelated-histories
scripts.git:merge:preview: git fetch upstream && git merge --no-commit upstream/master --allow-unrelated-histories
scripts.git:prepare: git add . && git add -f tools/install.js && git commit -m'setup'
scripts.git:setup: git init && git remote add upstream https://github.com/JonnyBGod/angular2-webpack-advance-starter.git
scripts.github-deploy:aot: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:aot && npm run ngc -- --webpack config/advance/webpack.web.prod.js && webpack --config config/advance/webpack.github-deploy.js --progress --profile  --bail --env.githubProd
scripts.start:desktop:windows: npm run server:dev:desktop && SET NODE_ENV=development && electron ./dist/main.desktop.js
